price: 60. Haddaydaan ii keeninna (walaakiin), kama heleysaan beeg xaggeyga, mana ii soo dhowaaneysaan (mar kale).
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَأۡتُونِي بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِندِي وَلَا تَقۡرَبُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-in lam tatūnī bihi falā kayla lakum ʿindī walā taqrabūni
